message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really love it. I'm offering it to you for $200. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $120 is just a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $175.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $175, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $165?
